mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ACCTBSINFSGMT (ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, REPAYPRD, APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, ASSETTRANDFLAG, FUNDSOU, LOANFORM, CREDITID, REPORTFLAG,LOANCONCODE,FIRSTHOULOANFLAG) values (#{AcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BusiLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BusiDtlLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OpenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AcctCredLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LoanAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RepayMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RepayFreqcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RepayPrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ApplyBusiDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{GuarMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OthRepyGuarWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AssetTrandFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FundSou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LoanForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CreditID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{LoanConCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{FirstHouLoanFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_ACCTBSINFSGMT set BUSILINES = #{BusiLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSIDTLLINES = #{BusiDtlLines,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENDATE = #{OpenDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CY = #{Cy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCTCREDLINE = #{AcctCredLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANAMT = #{LoanAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{Flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DUEDATE = #{DueDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAYMODE = #{RepayMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAYFREQCY = #{RepayFreqcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAYPRD = #{RepayPrd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLYBUSIDIST = #{ApplyBusiDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GUARMODE = #{GuarMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OTHREPYGUARWAY = #{OthRepyGuarWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASSETTRANDFLAG = #{AssetTrandFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUNDSOU = #{FundSou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANFORM = #{LoanForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREDITID = #{CreditID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOANCONCODE = #{LoanConCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRSTHOULOANFLAG = #{FirstHouLoanFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARAGRAPHDEL = #{ParagraphDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, REPAYPRD, nvl(APPLYBUSIDIST,' ') APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, ASSETTRANDFLAG, FUNDSOU, LOANFORM, CREDITID, REPORTFLAG,LOANCONCODE,FIRSTHOULOANFLAG,PARAGRAPHDEL from PBCRS_REPORT_ACCTBSINFSGMT where ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, REPAYPRD, APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, ASSETTRANDFLAG, FUNDSOU, LOANFORM, CREDITID, REPORTFLAG,LOANCONCODE,FIRSTHOULOANFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_ACCTBSINFSGMT
mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_ACCTBSINFSGMTM (ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, REPAYPRD, APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, ASSETTRANDFLAG, FUNDSOU, LOANFORM, CREDITID, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS,LOANCONCODE,FIRSTHOULOANFLAG) select ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO, BUSILINES, BUSIDTLLINES, OPENDATE, CY, ACCTCREDLINE, LOANAMT, FLAG, DUEDATE, REPAYMODE, REPAYFREQCY, REPAYPRD, APPLYBUSIDIST, GUARMODE, OTHREPYGUARWAY, ASSETTRANDFLAG, FUNDSOU, LOANFORM, CREDITID, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS,LOANCONCODE,FIRSTHOULOANFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_ACCTBSINFSGMT where ACCTBSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{AcctBsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
